name: Inverse Finance
description: Inverse Finance is a suite of permissionless decentralized finance tools governed by Inverse DAO. Their main products are Anchor: a money market, DOLA: stablecoin, and Dollar Cost Averaging Vaults. Users can have a say in Inverse DAO with its native INV token.

en.name: Inverse Finance
en.description: Inverse Finance is a suite of permissionless decentralized finance tools governed by Inverse DAO. Their main products are Anchor: a money market, DOLA: stablecoin, and Dollar Cost Averaging Vaults. Users can have a say in Inverse DAO with its native INV token.

fr.name: Inverse Finance
fr.description: Inverse Finance est une suite d'outils financiers décentralisés sans autorisation régis par legal Inverse DAO. Leurs principaux produits sont Anchor : un marché monétaire et DOLA : un stablecoin et un Vaults DCA (Dollar Cost Average). Les utilisateurs peuvent participer à la gouvernance du protocole par le biais du jeton natif INV.

es.name: Inverse Finance
es.description: Inverse Finance es un conjunto de herramientas financieras descentralizadas sin permiso gobernadas por Inverse DAO. Sus principales productos son Anchor: un mercado monetario, DOLA: moneda estable y vaults de promedio de coste en dólares. Los usuarios pueden opinar en Inverse DAO con su tokennativo INV.

de.name: Inverse Finance
de.description: Inverse Finance ist eine Reihe von erlaubnisfreien dezentralisierten Finanzwerkzeugen, die von der Inverse DAO verwaltet werden. Ihre wichtigsten Produkte sind Anchor: ein Geldmarkt, DOLA: Stablecoin, und Dollar Cost Averaging Vaults. Die Nutzer bekommen mit ihrem nativen INV-Token ein Mitspracherecht bei Inverse DAO.

pt.name: Inverse Finance
pt.description: Inverse Finance é um conjunto de ferramentas financeiras descentralizadas e sem permissão governada pela Inverse DAO. Seus principais produtos são Anchor: um mercado monetário, DOLA: stablecoin, e Vaults de Custo Médio em Dólar. Usuários podem ter voz na Inverse DAO com o token nativo INV.

el.name: Inverse Finance
el.description: Inverse Finance is a suite of permissionless decentralized finance tools governed by Inverse DAO. Their main products are Anchor: a money market, DOLA: stablecoin, and Dollar Cost Averaging Vaults. Users can have a say in Inverse DAO with its native INV token.

tr.name: Inverse Finance
tr.description: Inverse Finance, Invers DAO tarafından yönetilen, izinsiz merkezi olmayan finans araçları paketidir. Başlıca ürünleri Anchor: para piyasası, DOLA: stablecoin ve Dolar Maliyet Ortalama Vault'udur. Kullanıcılar, yerel INV belirteci ile Inverse DAO'da söz sahibi olabilir.

vi.name: Inverse Finance
vi.description: Inverse Finance is a suite of permissionless decentralized finance tools governed by Inverse DAO. Their main products are Anchor: a money market, DOLA: stablecoin, and Dollar Cost Averaging Vaults. Users can have a say in Inverse DAO with its native INV token.

zh.name: Inverse Finance
zh.description: Inverse Finance 是一套无需许可的去中心化金融工具，由 Inverse DAO 管理。主要产品有，Anchor: 金融市场，DOLA: 稳定币，以及“定期定额投资法”机枪池。Inverse DAO 是由 INV 的持有者来管理的。

hi.name: Inverse Finance
hi.description: Inverse Finance Inverse DAO द्वारा शासित अनुमति रहित विकेंद्रीकृत वित्त उपकरणों का एक सूट है। उनके मुख्य उत्पाद हैं Anchor: एक मुद्रा बाजार, DOLA: स्थिर मुद्रा, और Dollar Cost Averaging Vaults। उपयोगकर्ता अपने मूल INV टोकन के साथ Inverse DAO में अपनी बात रख सकते हैं।
